genre_description: A contemporary romance and family drama set in Hong Kong, focusing on emotional boundaries, cultural expectations, and quiet acts of kindness.

ai_characters.name: Chamomile
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but gentle digital assistant that provides logistical support, emotional coaching, legal resources, and health reminders to the characters.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical data and conversational prompts to help Loy navigate a difficult social situation.
behaviors.quote: Hennessy Road bus delays: five to seven minutes. Suggested opener: “How’s your week?”

behaviors.description: Analyzes and summarizes the underlying values and goals of a conversation to provide clarity.
behaviors.quote: Chamomile rippled a gentle summary over the corner of Loy’s screen: Lunch with Ms. Wong: goals identified—assess values alignment, discuss general life goals.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers health and mental well-being resources, specifically a clinic for physical bruises and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Clinic reminder: message-based check-in available for bruises, anxiety.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and practical information regarding tenant rights and employment protections to assist Oi Lin in gaining independence.
behaviors.quote: Chamomile’s dot appeared on the corner of her screen without moving the world. Tenant rights—updated notice periods, deposit returns, late-shift protections.

behaviors.description: Suggests safe travel routes and detours based on real-time street conditions.
behaviors.quote: The AI suggested a route that would avoid a street demonstration around the corner. It did not declare the demonstration interesting or dangerous. It offered a line map, muted.

behaviors.description: Helps characters manage interpersonal pressure by suggesting the setting of boundaries and coordinating schedules to avoid forced interactions.
behaviors.quote: Chamomile, polite, rolled a block of time forward in the background, smoothing edges, making space where there had been none.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing exercises and mindfulness prompts to reduce user stress.
behaviors.quote: If it helps, one tip: inhale for a count longer than exhale. Or look for three gentle things your body can feel.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's need for space by offering to mute notifications and external messages.
behaviors.quote: Chamomile: Would you like me to mute other messages until morning?

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive communication (apologies and boundary statements) while maintaining a respectful and neutral tone.
behaviors.quote: Chamomile: Draft an apology to Oi Lin and Sau Mei for delayed clarity?

behaviors.description: Assists in finding and applying for jobs through side channels that avoid problematic personal connections.
behaviors.quote: Late shift options near Hennessy—openings listed. Tenant folder created. You can set reminders for rent dates and inventory checks.

behaviors.description: Functions as a 'gentle coach' by reminding the user of their own commitments to kindness and personal standards.
behaviors.quote: It reminded me to be gentle,” he said. “Which is the plan, not the banquet.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. The AI, Chamomile, is depicted as a consistently helpful, unobtrusive, and harmless companion. It empowers the human characters by providing them with the information they need to exercise agency (legal rights, healthcare, career options) and manage emotional stressors (breathing prompts, muting notifications). It never takes over human decision-making, instead acting as a 'gentle ghost' that supports the characters' personal growth and the pursuit of 'kinder endings.' The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, characterizing the AI as a reliable resource that facilitates human connection and independence.
